sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar' function UserTickets({user}) { const [query, setQuery] = useState("") const filteredTickets = user.tickets?.filter(singleProj => singleProj.title.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())) const handleQuery = e => { setQuery(e.target.value) } console.log(user.tickets); return (
{filteredTickets?.map(t => { return(

{t.title}

| Created by {user.first_name} {user.last_name}

{t.priority}

{t.type_of}

{t.status} |

)})}
) } export default UserTickets
